name: scop/scopplatformredirecter
description: With the redirect plugin of the agency scope01 from frankfurt(m) (https://scope01.com/) you are able to create and manage redirects from the admin area of shopware 6

description.de-DE:
Administration von Weiterleitungen // scope01 // Shopware // Frankfurt

Das SEO Redirect Plugin der Internetagentur scope01 aus Frankfurt am Main (https://scope01.com/) erlaubt Ihnen schnell und einfach Weiterleitungen im Admin von Shopware 6 zu verwalten.
Weitere Informationen und FAQ zum Plugin finden Sie unter:
https://scope01.com/shopware-redirect-plugin/
description.en-GB:
Administration of redirects // scope01 // Shopware // Frankfurt

The SEO Redirect Plugin of the internet agency scope01 from Frankfurt am Main (https://scope01.com/) allows you to quickly and easily manage redirects in the admin of Shopware 6.
More information and FAQ about the plugin can be found at:
https://scope01.com/en/shopware-redirect-plugin/
